original_title: Classic Cartoon Favorites, Vol. 3 - Starring Goofy
overview: All of the shorts on here feature Goofy  The Art of Skiing (1941)  How to Fish (1942)  How to Swim (1942)  Baggage Buster (1941)  How to Dance (1953)  Lion Down (1951)  The Big Wash (1948)  Hold That Pose (1950)  Father's Day Off (1953)
title: Classic Cartoon Favorites, Vol. 3 - Starring Goofy
